title: Civilization; Sharp serifs
content:
Can anyone ID this for me? TIA.

comments.content:
Hello  
Please check:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/Roman-SD.font?text=THE%20RISE%20OF%20EUROPE](http://web.archive.org/web/20140730011414/http:/www.whatfontis.com/Roman-SD.font?text=THE%20RISE%20OF%20EUROPE "http://www.whatfontis.com/Roman-SD.font?text=THE%20RISE%20OF%20EUROPE")  
Alex  
I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140730011414/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!

Thanks, Alexandru.

BTW, the font doesn't look bad in the sample above, but in use, I found it dreadful.
